alert.note: Alert for La Salle; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 17 at 2:28AM CDT until March 17 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central La Salle County in south central Texas... McMullen County in south central Texas... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 228 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Fowlerton, or 20 miles west of Tilden, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tilden, Calliham, Zella and Fowlerton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
